articles.title: Disintegration tries to be too much — impressions - Polygon
articles.description: Disintegration is a hybrid first-person shooter and real-time strategy game. It is both of these things (and more) and yet also, somehow, neither. The game is based on a handful of good ideas, few of which come together with any coherence.
articles.content:
PlayingDisintegration always feels like Im playing multiple games at once. 
Disintegration is a hybrid first-person shooter and real-time strategy game from V1 Interactive. It is both of these thing… [+6927 chars]

articles.author: Petrana Radulovic
articles.title: Two new Kingdom Hearts games will arrive later this year - Polygon
articles.description: A new Kingdom Hearts mobile game, Kingdom Hearts: Union Dark Road, and a new rhythm game, Kingdom Hearts: Melody of Memory, will debut later in 2020. Also some new figurines and an expansion to Kingdom Hearts: Union X.
articles.content: The first one hits mobile platforms next week

articles.title: Israeli scientists can eavesdrop conversations using a light bulb - The Jerusalem Post
articles.description: By pointing a telescope at a hanging light bulb in the target room and passing the information through a standard laptop, researchers were able to eavesdrop from 25 meters away.
